documents.document: @adam_phelps No handshake, a kiss hello is what I got...
Had a first meeting today (not a date) and got a kiss smack bang on the mouth. Is this normal? I'm usually a cheek kisser myself...
@bron_two It's the top part of your lips 👄. Yeah, half of them have no idea what they want (aka looking for whatever they can get)
Dude with no lips seeks woman with pronounced Cupid's bow. 😝 https://t.co/63wgIJFegq
Do people on Tinder write "sleeping" and "eating" as hobbies so that they can claim you have something in common?
Trying to imagine the upbringing and values one must have to be on the supporter side of Trump and I just can't wrap my brain around it
So over half-arsed fucks who can't do their job properly
@ColourpurpleGal As long as strong independent women, we invest in the proper tools, anything is possible!
My month in review was disappointing. Too much energy and attention expended elsewhere. This focussing solely on myself thing is tricky
Some guy just asked me if I can go long periods without sex after I told him my stance on casual sex. I guess that's my super power?
Men who don't fill in their dating profiles aren't mysterious, they just can't spell
Looking for someone I don't have to explain this to https://t.co/QqU75sJudf
He messaged me today saying he was "off the rails" and is giving up alcohol for 2017. What a catch!
Some guy who managed to get my number last week referred to me as "Fat Pink" and then was surprised when I didn't want to chat again
@Daveo_au Not wanting to put any effort in, essentially
@Daveo_au Not wanting to level up. Not wanting amazing, just happy to be and have ordinary
Pretty sure I just walked out the front with my dress tucked in to my nickers. Which is why I hate wearing nickers...
I've considered just asking friends to play matchmaker, but then there's extra pressure
@jurassic_snark_ I love your bio BTW
Men on dating sites say they're "easy going" and looking for the same. I've come to learn that's code for "happy with the status quo".
@aleisha_71 Yes, the streak. It's a shoot first think later mentality & I'm much more kind & gentle than that. There's only so much I can tk
@aleisha_71 I've found they can be horribly selfish. Cancer + Scorpio is supposed to be hot, but I can't handle the nasty
@aleisha_71 Me? I'm a Cancer, Libra rising. Scorpios are known to seek revenge, that's how I know. I've dated 3 in a row...
@TheMrFish There's nothing like Mummy cuddles
@aleisha_71 Hahaha! I'm a witch, apparently.
Just received a very teary FaceTime from Ms9 who is missing me. It's been three days. She's swinging by for a cuddle later.
@aleisha_71 You're not a Scorpio by any chance, are you?
Just saw someone I went to primary school with on Tinder. Somehow he's managed to lose 6 years from his age. Wow!
Watching Crazy Ex-Girlfriend on Netflix. It's making me feel VERY normal
What is it like to date someone you don't care about?
@aleisha_71 I'm trying to keep up. What exactly did this guy do to deserve being treated like this?
Hey sexy stranger, come back to my place and I hope you're not a murderer. Kiss me baby all over the place, and please don't be a murderer.
Ms9 was given a smart watch for Xmas. Whenever she's away and I'm thinking of her, I can send her love. I wish we could do this for everyone
I feel bad clicking the red X when they've superliked me, but whatever.
@garydlum Thanks Gaz. My hormones must be out of whack this month as it's not normally an issue. Must up my self-care.
My unwanted subscription to Satan's crimson waterfall is here and it's killing me from the inside
@ashevansen My soulmate? We're friends. It was a nice thing for him to acknowledge, because we are, but not in the traditional sense. 😊
@ashevansen I didn't see him, he's in the US. He got in touch again, but I told him I couldn't help him and wished him luck
@MickGeorge Nah, I'm okay. Can't sleep, but am otherwise okay. 😊
@ashevansen When? Which one?
@uuNICoornn Text is the perfect medium for miscommunication. What's done is done, time to haul arse and move on. 😉
Today I kicked my baby toe on the door frame, twice in half an hour. That was probably my low for today
@easybeinggreenx Thanks xx
@easybeinggreenx Yeah. It was a big misunderstanding that could have been sorted with communication, but that didn't happen
@Miss_Chezz Feeling a bit meh, but I'll get through it, thanks. 😊
and I just got back from a fairly heavy debrief with my most recent ex after it ended apparently quite accidentally via SMS 2 weeks ago.
Big week! A distant friend declared I'm his soul mate, the guy who ruined me got back in touch again today and lied about his r'ship status
@lickmycupcakes How do you know Ben Affleck?
I'm glad that series just ended unexpectedly, I was going to go to sleep now anyway. #noiwasnt
We mostly missed it, but it was beautiful @ Telstra Tower Canberra https://t.co/TJfYbAKOkW
Using regular models to advertise plus-sized swimwear #fail https://t.co/5rFenZRUt9
@The_Eccles Canberra has one too
@micromho And yet I am neither and knew the difference...
When you hang the sheets first and they're dry by the time you run out of line space for the rest of your washing. #straya #winning
@aleisha_71 I get "can I take you out?" And always ask "Whatever would we talk about?!" If you can't talk here then I'm not wasting my time
@aleisha_71 I find those who r least adept socially are the quickest to lock down an in-person meeting. I follow @evanmarckatz 2/2/2 advice
@aleisha_71 I think that's a hugely motivating force for 98% of people on those sites.
@aleisha_71 Hahaha! I get the "I like your profile, please respond so I can know you further" and I'm like "what's in it for me?!"
@aleisha_71 Yup! Every time I read your tweets I wonder how many of them I've encountered.
@aleisha_71 We should get together and compare notes. Canberra's a shallow pool....
@Brentendo_64 There's a gap in the market then... get on it!
@Brentendo_64 Aah. Aren't there geek specialty dating sites? I know there's a proper one, surely the geeks are on this?!
@Brentendo_64 What's wrong with young?
@Brentendo_64 One word: CanCon
At 42 years of age, he argued his point with me until I googled the answer and showed him he was wrong. That didn't go down so well either.
He claimed it was a unit of measurement larger and more powerful than a gigawatt. I claimed the actor merely mispronounced gigawatt. >>
What confounds me though, is that when watching Back To The Future together, he actually argued with me about the Jigawatt. >>
My ex apparently studied (but didn't complete) Aerospace Engineering and Criminal Justice, according to his FB profile. >>
I might go to @violentfemmes at Annies Lane in Queanbeyan Nsw... https://t.co/gnFzFNxVYk
@uuNICoornn @TheMrFish But also a visit in 1985. I just saw them turning on to Dunrossil Dr in '89 and they waved to us from the car. 💕
@TheMrFish I saw them then too! Wiki tells me it was 1985, one year off. Not bad for an old memory!
@TheMrFish What year was that? I remember that too
@uuNICoornn @Miz_Rosenberg Mine was visiting the Aus Nat Botanical Gardens to see Charles and Di in 1984, on excursion with my Kindy class.
I cooked dinner and Ms9 made dessert! Banana ice cream with nothing… https://t.co/WIHuebLSuc
Watching The Jungle Book and I've decided that I want to be a bear. I'll happily sleep through the winter
Just posted a photo https://t.co/hwOTBuAmTB
Hey Canberra! You're beautiful. https://t.co/rAHiTf5GS2
Men are just as capable of empathizing and responding to emotion as women are. https://t.co/Vet2rYmYxg
When did coffee become king? Was it when busy became a status symbol?
@MickGeorge Thank you! I've just gotta stop making these rookie errors!
@SomethingFyshy I don't even know anymore
@uuNICoornn I thought we were in discussions, but it turns out we're not
@bron_two I honestly didn't think this kind of behaviour would still be happening at this stage of life
@102megan We were in discussions about ending it and decided to talk in person and I'm waiting to hear when that will be but discovered that
Just posted a photo https://t.co/wnfTBy6MOL
@102megan It's okay. It was to be expected given the other blips
@bron_two You get that.... there were signs.
@chasesterling No pain yet. It wasn't a long relationship, I guess I expected this. I thought we were still talking about stuff, but no.
And do you want to know how I know I'm single? Unfriended on Facebook
Things change pretty quick around here. Yesterday's journal question: What is going well? My answer? My relationship. Today? Single again.
My 2y/o niece is so sweet. She spotted my "ouchie" and keeps kissing it better. 💕 https://t.co/06IAPq7kDB
@PineRiverGypsy And did you talk to her or the parents?
@PineRiverGypsy How old was she?
I need to talk to his mum about it without sounding like a cranky old woman.
I'm getting bombarded with texts, voice messages, and FaceTime calls and my patience is wearing thin.
My 9y/o nephew has been given an iPhone and a SIM card, but not the maturity or supervision to use them appropriately.
When I've made the bath too hot, I like to flip sideways and hang my legs out the side. Because I'm versatile like that.
Just got in the bath and received a text from my 9y/o nephew asking how I'm doing. What a thoughtful poppet!
@Miss_Chezz Sugar? Or shaving?
I took my 2y/o niece for a swim this evening and when I was leaving she climbed in the car and insisted she come home with me. #love
